text: In Canada, the 1958 Governor General's Awards for Literary Merit were the twenty-second such awards. The awards in this period were an honour for the authors but had no monetary prize. ==Winners== *Fiction: Colin McDougall, Execution. *Poetry or Drama: James Reaney, A Suit of Nettles. *Non-Fiction: Pierre Berton, Klondike. *Non-Fiction: Joyce Hemlow, The History of Fanny Burney. *Juvenile: Edith L. Sharp, Nkwala. Category:Governor General's Awards Governor General's Awards Governor General's Awards
title: 1958 Governor General's Awards
